h3.span: For immediate safety concerns regarding yourself or others, call 911.

div.span:
- Franklin Cty. @ (614) 722-1800
- Delaware Cty. @ (740) 369-4482
- You can also text the keyword "HELLO" to 741741

24-Hour Suicide Prevention Hotline
1-(800)-273-TALK
Domestic Violence/Teen Dating Abuse Hotline
1-(866)-331-9474
National Domestic Violence Hotline
1-(800)-799-7233 or
Text LOVEIS to 22522
Runaway Hotline
1-(800)-786-2929
WCS Safe School Helpline
1-(800)-4-1-VOICE ext. 359

div.a: Bright by Text: FREE service to all families in Franklin County.

div.span: Get free tips and learning games sent to your cell phone. Whether you're a parent, grandparent, aunt or uncle, neighbor, or babysitter, Bright by Text can make caring for a little one, birth to eight years of age, easier!
